Web theme for GT

gt_theme.Rd

Web theme for GT

Usage

gt_theme(
  data,
  align = "center",
  background_color = "#222222",
  font_color = "#DDDDDD",
  column_label_size = 18,
  table_font_size = 16,
  table_padding = 2,
  ...
)

Arguments

data

gt object

align

column alignment (left, right, center)

background_color

table background

font_color

font color

column_label_size

header font size

table_font_size

table font size
